hydroroot
    hydroroot.__init__ doc todo
    hydroroot.analysis Define a set of methods to ease the analysis and simulation
    hydroroot.conductance Axial or radial conductance calculation
    hydroroot.curve Define a set of methods to ease the analysis and simulation
    hydroroot.display Some plotting functions
    hydroroot.flux Flux computation
    hydroroot.generator.markov Markov generation of MTG
    hydroroot.generator.measured_root Create a MTG from length laws

    hydroroot.law length laws
    hydroroot.length Define a set of methods to ease the analysis and simulation
    hydroroot.main Reconstruct or simulate root system and compute global conductance and flux.
    hydroroot.radius Compute radius on MTG, and length, surface, volume from MTG.
